ID: CBJRJO8_00
From: One Reach <OneReach@chalhoub.com>
To: 
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-03-26 16:16
Subject: Information Security Advisory: Oracle Confirms No Customer Data Breach
--------------------------------------------------
 

 <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/> 

Dear Colleague, 

 

Information Security is aware of recent online reports alleging a breach involving the Oracle Cloud environment. While these headlines have drawn attention, Oracle has officially confirmed that there has been no customer data breach.

We are closely monitoring the situation in collaboration with our technology partners. Our security monitoring and threat intelligence controls remain active and effective in detecting and responding to any potential threats.

At this time, no action is required. However, we encourage everyone to continue following best security practices. Please report any suspicious activity immediately.

If you have any questions or concerns, don’t hesitate to contact us at Information.Security@chalhoub.com <mailto:Information.Security@chalhoub.com> 

 

Chalhoub Technology & Data Status Page <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/> 

Subscribe <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/subscriber/account>
